description: This file manages master GSAP timelines for an interactive scrollytelling webpage, controlling DOM elements, Three.js camera and scene, and animations synchronized with scroll events. It also handles responsiveness and reduced-motion preferences.

methods.name: collectChapters()
methods.description: Utility function to gather sections and labels from DOM dataset.

methods.name: ensureModelPart(obj, scene)
methods.description: Utility to create placeholder objects for missing Three.js model parts.

methods.name: createMasterTimeline({ threeApi, pinTargetSelector = ".canvas-layer", containerSelector = ".sections" })
methods.description: Creates a master scroll-driven timeline with camera and model animations, supporting responsiveness and accessibility preferences.
